sentences.sentence: In fact, going beyond compliance saves cost at the same time that it generates cash, provided that management adopts the new lean and green model.
sentences.translation: 事实上，如果管理层采用新的精益和绿色管理模式，超越合规性可以在产生现金的同时节约成本。

sentences.sentence: That is far less likely to happen if Congress also adopts strong "pay-go" rules requiring that any increase in payments to providers be offset by new taxes or budget cuts.
sentences.translation: 如果国会也采取强硬的“现收现付”规则，要求用新的税收或预算削减来抵消增加的支付给供应商的费用，这种情况发生的可能性就会小得多。

sentences.sentence: When a whole culture adopts an upward look, incredible things can be accomplished.
sentences.translation: 当整个文化呈现出积极向上的面貌时，再不可思议的事情也能做到。
